briefTitle: Comparing the Efficacy of Symbicort® pMDI and Formoterol Turbuhaler in Reducing Exacerbations in Patients With Cronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
officialTitle: A Phase IIIB, 6-Month, Double-blind, Double-dummy, Randomized, Parallel-group, Multicenter Exacerbation Study of Symbicort® Pressurized Metered-Dose Inhaler (pMDI) 160/4.5 μg x 2 Actuations Twice-daily Compared to Formoterol Turbuhaler 4.5 μg x 2 Inhalations Twice-daily in Cronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients.
summary: Comparing the efficacy of Symbicort® pMDI and Formoterol Turbuhaler in reducing exacerbations in patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD).

primaryOutcome.measure: The Rate of Moderate and Severe COPD Exacerbations Defined as: Worsening of ≥2 Major Symptoms or Worsening of 1 Major Symptom Together With ≥1 Minor Symptom for ≥2 Consecutive Days
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Randomization at Week 0 to End of Treatment (EoT) W 26
